data.text: @kman6842 @PekalaLaw @EWoodhouse7 It’s under control. We  never had to dig mass graves. It’s effected those who are HIGH https://t.co/k6MfBjuUEc 75 yr MIL  never got it while living w 3 people who did (mild symptoms) take care of ur body & stay home if sick. I put U07.1 on medical records,so I’m good w ur therory
@KevinCa23425576 @PekalaLaw @EWoodhouse7 Thank you for asking. Their young and like others their age made quick and full recoveries.
@MarieChi21 @PekalaLaw @EWoodhouse7 Not trying to be a know-it-all but I respect you opinion. Just wanted to state some facts
@MarieChi21 @PekalaLaw @EWoodhouse7 If bitten by an animal with rabies their is treatment to save the persons life in the form of a vaccine. That is if they contract rabies.

@MarieChi21 @PekalaLaw @EWoodhouse7 Smallpox was a virus. It was eradicated by 1979 in the US and most of the world. Polio was has also been gone since 79 Some that didn’t vaccines like Afghanistan still have occasional occurrence’s. And don’t forget rabies’s. It’s not gone but has been under control with vaccines

@MarieChi21 @PekalaLaw @EWoodhouse7 It’s to get it under control. This is a pandemic. Millions lost around the world. Every little bit helps. You wouldn’t tell people to stop covering their mouth when they cough would you?

@Spiderperson123 @PekalaLaw @EWoodhouse7 They were ok yes. But they almost lost their PawPaw. I couldn’t say 3 words without being out of breath and fighting to get another breath. What would their opinion if they lost me who is also the only father figure they have
@gracialivie @PekalaLaw @EWoodhouse7 Only 22,000 thought it was a stupid question and threw the survey in the trash.
